attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Foxes are a menance to our gardens and to our much loved pets. They are simply not domestic enough to roam our streets and are a safety hazzard to drivers...unless you can get each of them to wear a glow print jacket! I'm sure this applies more to Londoners than anyone else. I am currently living with my parents, who are both disabled, they are constantly having to wake up during the middle of the night to scare off the foxes to avoid them ripping our refuse bags. I'm sure many of you have been involved in a same or a similar situation. Therefore, i kindly requst from you all, if you agree ofcourse, to sign this petition to bring back fox hunting.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=hunting
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
